channel.title: My experience and struggles applying engineering to software development (Posts about software engineering)

item.title: Build the E in ETL
item.dc:creator: George Peristerakis
item.description:
Building the E in ETL

This is a exercise in building an extraction module. I'm motivated in learning the latest language features of Python 3.7. Also, I'm hoping at the end of this exercise, I learn something.

item.title: What is in the name? Guidelines on naming when programming
item.dc:creator: George Peristerakis
item.description:
What is in the name?

Here is a guideline on naming

Naming a class

The class is contained concept.

Naming a function

A function's role is either a ? / ?

Naming a variable

(option) added the unit type: temperature_celsius or temperature_fahrenheit

If you still can't find a name
